name: Camouflage Bomber Jacket
description: Featuring the STEALTH zip up 2-in-1 quilted bomber jacket. This fatigue camo printed jacket portrays a traditional bomber silhouette and is constructed from high quality woven nylon. This style features detachable sleeves which lends itself to be worn as a sleeveless or full sleeved bomber. The finer details include a left chest chevron shield, SERGEANT PEPPER embroidered right sleeve applique and branded tag on the left sleeve pocket. An exceptional transitional item to have!
